page.title: 07A FARMER
page.content: Mr.Morris farms at{Craig Barn Farm}in Crickhowell. He farms 75 acres on a {marginal type}farm which means it is partly mountain land and partly lowland . He has 300{sheep}and 25 {cattle}with a little{hay.}He describes himself more as a businessman today for he buys lambs when they are cheap and feeds them until the price is right to sell them at a profit. He was born on a farm and is building himself a bungalow at the bottom of his land for his retirement. He is able to do many things himself ,mend the tractor,build walls etc. His farmhouse is bathed in sun and has a spectacular view which he says is worth more than anything. He believes that you should always try to leave something better than you find it. He is also very clever at training{sheep dogs.
